schema.name: Spicy Chicken Mongolian No Rice
recipeIngredient: 0.50 cup shredded, Lettuce, green leaf, raw

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the carrots, shred the lettuce, slice the cucumbers and radishes, and slice the zucchini.
Cut the chicken breast into thin strips.

In a large pan, heat a tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and chicken strips. Cook for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the chicken is browned and cooked through.
Add the chopped carrots, sliced zucchini, and a pinch of salt to the pan. Cook for another 5 minutes until the vegetables are tender.
Serve the chicken and vegetables over a bed of shredded lettuce, topped with sliced cucumbers and radishes.

schema.description: This Spicy Chicken Mongolian No Rice recipe is perfect for those following a health-conscious, low-carb, and low-sodium diet. Enjoy a deliciously Healthyfied twist on the classic Mongolian dish, featuring fresh vegetables and tender chicken breast for a nutritious meal.
